data.description: Coordinates the formal environmental impact review (AMDAL) for BESS projects >10 MWh, including commission review, conditional approvals, and public hearings.
data.functional_role: environmental risk classification and mitigation enforcement

notes.informal_notes: Commission behavior is variable and sensitive to political signals or NGO presence. Some developers pre-negotiate draft AMDALs to avoid hearing triggers.
notes.symbolic_scaffold: AMDAL documents often used to signal environmental alignment to funders and communities, not just regulatory bodies.
notes.feedback_structure: Structured revision process + optional community feedback loop; no hard limit on resubmissions.
failure_modes: AMDAL revision loop with unclear expectations
Triggering public hearing due to stakeholder pressure
Approval stalled due to inter-agency disagreement on impact classification
